thread.title: City snapshot: Lenta issues bond to fund store expansion plans
thread.title_full: City snapshot: Lenta issues bond to fund store expansion plans

title: City snapshot: Lenta issues bond to fund store expansion plans
text:
02 Sep 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
UK-listed Russian supermarket chain Lenta is seeking to raise RUB5bn (Â£49m) via the bond markets to fund new store openings, Morrisons teeters on the edge of FTSE 100 demotion and the City is hit by more Chinese economic woes. Available to members only
